msg.msgText:
Test the connection to queue managers or LDAP servers by using the "imaserver test" command
SYNTAX: imaserver test help imaserver test object_type help imaserver test object_type EXAMPLE: imaserver test QueueManagerConnection "Name=QMConn1" imaserver test QueueManagerConnection "QueueManagerName=QM" "ConnectionName=127.0.0.1" "ChannelName=CHANNEL1" imaserver test LDAP "URL=ldap://127.0.0.1:389" "BindDN=cn=abcd" "BindPassword=xxxxx" imaserver test LogAutoTransfer "Destination=ftp://192.168.56.1" "UserID=test" "Password=xxxxx"
The following composite configuration object types are supported: QueueManagerConnection MQConnectivity queue manager connection object LDAP External LDAP configuration LogAutoTransfer Automatic log file transfer configuration
NOTES: 1. The configuration object types (e.g. "QueueManagerConnection") are case sensitive. 2. Each "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
